sure...

try running `rake guides:generate` and this error with strong parameters will be raised.

```
rake guides:generate
/usr/local/bin/ruby rails_guides.rb
/home/deployer/host/apps/rails/actionpack/lib/action_controller/metal/strong_parameters.rb:382:in `<class:Parameters>': cannot load such file -- rack/test (LoadError)
	from /home/deployer/host/apps/rails/actionpack/lib/action_controller/metal/strong_parameters.rb:99:in `<module:ActionController>'
	from /home/deployer/host/apps/rails/actionpack/lib/action_controller/metal/strong_parameters.rb:7:in `<top (required)>'
	from /usr/local/lib/ruby/site_ruby/2.0.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:106:in `require'
	from /usr/local/lib/ruby/site_ruby/2.0.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:106:in `require'
	from /home/deployer/host/apps/rails/actionpack/lib/action_controller.rb:5:in `<top (required)>'
	from /usr/local/lib/ruby/site_ruby/2.0.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:45:in `require'
	from /usr/local/lib/ruby/site_ruby/2.0.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:45:in `require'
	from /home/deployer/host/apps/rails/guides/rails_guides/generator.rb:57:in `<top (required)>'
	from /usr/local/lib/ruby/site_ruby/2.0.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:45:in `require'
	from /usr/local/lib/ruby/site_ruby/2.0.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:45:in `require'
	from rails_guides.rb:43:in `<main>'
rake aborted!
Command failed with status (1): [/usr/local/bin/ruby rails_guides.rb...]
/home/deployer/host/apps/rails/guides/Rakefile:11:in `block (3 levels) in <top (required)>'
Tasks: TOP => guides:generate => guides:generate:html
```

this error indicates an error in this line
https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/6a20cf4f0532b3e0e397aead76eff28f87135e2d/actionpack/lib/action_controller/metal/strong_parameters.rb#L382

which is basically complaining that 'rack/test' hasn't been required in this project.


a possibility should be solving the error where it is invoked,
https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/6a20cf4f0532b3e0e397aead76eff28f87135e2d/actionpack/lib/action_controller/metal/strong_parameters.rb#L6
but I believe suggesting that would not be justifiable since all rails tests do pass.


and since it's inside action_controller,
I believe requiring this file should be done inside the guides scope, before action_controller is required
https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/6a20cf4f0532b3e0e397aead76eff28f87135e2d/guides/rails_guides/generator.rb#L57
